title: Scroll of remove curse
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

| Type | Scroll                                                                                                     |
| :--- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name | Scroll of remove curse                                                                                     |
| Icon | [![Scroll of remove curse.png](/images/4/4b/Scroll_of_remove_curse.png)](/File:Scroll_of_remove_curse.png) |

|   |                                                                    |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------ |
|   | A scroll that removes any curses from the reader's equipped items. |

The **scroll of remove curse** uncursed all [cursed](/Curse "Curse") items you are wearing or wielding. It will not remove the curse from any items sitting in your inventory; you will need to equip them first before using it.

> You feel as if something is helping you.

## Strategy

- A scroll of remove curse lets you test [armour](/Armour "Armour"), [weapons](/Weapon "Weapon"), and [jewellery](/Jewellery "Jewellery") without the risk of being stuck with cursed gear. Try to save up several item types to test at the same time, as one scroll can uncurse any number of equipment slots. Keep in mind that certain [amulets](/Amulet "Amulet") and some [artefacts](/Artefact "Artefact") can possess [properties](/Properties "Properties") that can negatively affect the player when an item is removed!
- Worshippers of [Ashenzari](/Ashenzari "Ashenzari") can consume a scroll of remove curse to place a curse upon an item of their choosing.

## History

- In [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), [curses](/Curse "Curse") were globally removed, removing the need to remove curse.
- Prior to [0.18](/0.18 "0.18"), the player could use [scrolls of enchant armour](/Scroll_of_enchant_armour "Scroll of enchant armour") and [enchant weapon](/Scroll_of_enchant_weapon "Scroll of enchant weapon") to remove curses.

| [Scrolls](/Scroll "Scroll")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Acquirement](/Scroll_of_acquirement "Scroll of acquirement") • [Amnesia](/Scroll_of_amnesia "Scroll of amnesia") • [Butterflies](/Scroll_of_butterflies "Scroll of butterflies") • [Blinking](/Scroll_of_blinking "Scroll of blinking") • [Brand weapon](/Scroll_of_brand_weapon "Scroll of brand weapon") • [Enchant armour](/Scroll_of_enchant_armour "Scroll of enchant armour") • [Enchant weapon](/Scroll_of_enchant_weapon "Scroll of enchant weapon") • [Fear](/Scroll_of_fear "Scroll of fear") • [Fog](/Scroll_of_fog "Scroll of fog") • [Identify](/Scroll_of_identify "Scroll of identify") • [Immolation](/Scroll_of_immolation "Scroll of immolation") • [Noise](/Scroll_of_noise "Scroll of noise") • [Poison](/Scroll_of_poison "Scroll of poison") • [Revelation](/Scroll_of_revelation "Scroll of revelation") • [Silence](/Scroll_of_silence "Scroll of silence") • [Summoning](/Scroll_of_summoning "Scroll of summoning") • [Teleportation](/Scroll_of_teleportation "Scroll of teleportation") • [Torment](/Scroll_of_torment "Scroll of torment") • [Vulnerability](/Scroll_of_vulnerability "Scroll of vulnerability") |

Scroll of remove curse

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.
Type Scroll
Name Scroll of remove curse
Icon
A scroll that removes any curses from the reader's equipped items.

The scroll of remove curse uncursed all cursed items you are wearing or wielding. It will not remove the curse from any items sitting in your inventory; you will need to equip them first before using it.

You feel as if something is helping you.

Strategy

  • A scroll of remove curse lets you test armour, weapons, and jewellery without the risk of being stuck with cursed gear. Try to save up several item types to test at the same time, as one scroll can uncurse any number of equipment slots. Keep in mind that certain amulets and some artefacts can possess properties that can negatively affect the player when an item is removed!
  • Worshippers of Ashenzari can consume a scroll of remove curse to place a curse upon an item of their choosing.

History

  • In 0.27, curses were globally removed, removing the need to remove curse.
  • Prior to 0.18, the player could use scrolls of enchant armour and enchant weapon to remove curses.
